name: Wine & Dinegeon
description: Wine and Dinegeon is a cross between a Zelda-like dungeon crawler and the TV show Frasier. You play as Avery who has just recently inherited their Great Uncle’s Mansion. Avery is kind, loving and unsophisticated, but with the help of the family’s pretentious pet bird named Pierce, Avery will manage to host their first dinner party. To entice the guests, Pierce has instructed Avery to go to the depths of the cheese cellar, wine cellar and more to select the very best dinner party components. But you should be careful, the cellars are full of vengeful Horror d’oeuvres.
